title: Kinnikuman: Seigi Choujin vs. Kodai Choujin
synopsis: While Kinnikuman is on vacation with Mari-san's kindergarten class at Easter Island, the young wheelchair-bound Kouichi-kun laments being with an idiot like Kinnikuman, preferring to instead be with his favorite Seigi Choujin Buffaloman. Meanwhile, the other Seigi Choujins are also vacationing at ancient landmarks.
related_anime: ['Kinnikuman: Gyakushuu! Uchuu Kakure Choujin', 'Kinnikuman: Ooabare! Seigi Choujin', 'Kinnikuman']
